wordGroup: punitive damage 惩罚性赔偿；惩罚性损害

sentences.en: He said companies should face punitive civil penalties running into millions of dollars.
sentences.cn: 他说各公司应当面临高达上百万美元的惩罚性民事处罚。

sentences.en: There are calls for more punitive measures against people who drink and drive.
sentences.cn: 有人呼吁对酒后驾车的人要有更具处罚性的措施。
